title: Mrs Eaves
content: Is it just me or is Mrs Eaves a challenging typeface to work with? Really beautiful, but requires a alot of tweaking. Wondering if it's just me.
author: bfingeroth

comments.content:
It's not you. It's very poorly spaced.

hhp
With a tiny x-height, but a very fun character set. The petite caps are very cute.
Thanks! Definitely a relief to hear that.
And don’t forget [Mrs. Eaves Just Ligatures Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720014958/http:/www.emigre.com/fontpage.php?PMEJLigR.html). Lot’s of fun to be had there!
Poor spacing even within those ligatures, to my eyes!
